price: 15. Ir ištiesų, Mes tai palikome kaip ženklą. Ar atsiras tada tas, kuris prisimena (arba priima pamoką)?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
